abstract: Yahoo has retreated from its core Web search business, outsourcing it to the software giant. This turns Yahoo into a company oddly reminiscent of the Internet also-ran AOL.
snippet: Yahoo has retreated from its core Web search business, outsourcing it to the software giant. This turns Yahoo into a company oddly reminiscent of the Internet also-ran AOL.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo has finally signed a deal with Microsoft, but dithering for a year and a half has hurt. Instead of selling itself for a chunky premium, Yahoo has retreated from its core Web search business, outsourcing it to the software giant. This turns Yahoo into a company oddly reminiscent of the Internet also-ran AOL.

headline.main: Shades of AOL in a Search Deal
headline.print_headline: Shades of AOL in a Search Deal
